summary: Stan Lee: la statua di Superman a Metropolis onora la morte del fumettista
title: Stan Lee: la statua di Superman a Metropolis onora la morte del fumettista
body:
Stan Lee: la statua di Superman a Metropolis onora la morte del fumettista

La morte di Stan Lee ha toccato veramente tutti nel profondo, ma al tempo stesso è bellissimo vedere come persone da tutto il mondo si siano riunite per commemorare una delle figure più importanti del panorama fumettistico, e che ha continuato ad essere un vero e proprio emblema con i suoi ancor più popolari cameo cinematografici.

Ad ogni modo, come colosso dei fumetti supereroistici, anche la DC…

View On WordPress

External image

La morte di Stan Lee ha toccato veramente tutti nel profondo, ma al tempo stesso è bellissimo vedere come persone da tutto il mondo si siano riunite per commemorare una delle figure più importanti del panorama fumettistico, e che ha continuato ad essere un vero e proprio emblema con i suoi ancor più popolari cameo cinematografici.

Ad ogni modo, come colosso dei fumetti supereroistici, anche la DC…

summary:
Pairing: Bucky x Reader
Warnings:   several chapters of over-wordiness with very little plot
Summary: A mission requiring your...
body:
New Story Preview!

Pairing: Bucky x Reader

Warnings: several chapters of over-wordiness with very little plot

Summary: A mission requiring your experience puts you the Avengers Team, temporarily. Paired up with Bucky Barnes and left alone in the woods for five days - it might be difficult to stay focused on the mission at hand. But who’s complaining? 

This is for the love Fabiola’s @the-canary writing challenge! I had such a blast writing this one lol.

Playlist Link

Tags are open! Here’s the preview, straight from chapter 5:

You wave the knife around awkwardly in a circle. It’s not exactly pleasant to imagine stabbing someone, or having to defend yourself from being stabbed.  “It’s heavy,” you say at last, and Bucky chortles.

“An outdoors girl like you, outmatched by a combat knife? Come on, you can do better than that. Do reverse grip, edge out.” Bucky demonstrates, which is nice, because you already forgot. You copy his grip, but he gives a huff.

“No. Keep those fingers curled - ” Slipping his knife into the holster at his thigh, Bucky reaches over to adjust your hold. His fingers are warm, especially compared to yours. “Extend your index finger over the back, like so,” he says. He’s closer for this demonstration; you can feel his chest pressing into your arm. Into your ear, he continues, “Don’t grip the shaft so tightly. It’ll hurt if you squeeze too hard.”

You blink stupidly at the knife. The hot breath on your neck, the husky tone of his voice is starting to make you a little suspicious. Your fingers are limp, and at his silence, you tilt your head to stare back at him in a double-take

“Uhhh,” you say, just to keep things awkward.

“What?” Bucky’s eyes are very blue, and very close to your own.

“Nothing.”

“Well, not too loose. You need some pressure. Otherwise you’ll lose your grip and that won’t feel so good,“ his fingers curl over yours as he continues to speak low in your ear, "There’s a sweet spot for just the right firmness, but not too much for any discomfort…”

“Okay…” you say. There’s a flicker of a frown on his lips now; he must notice that your attention’s been diverted.

“Not too loose, not too tight,” Bucky says, voice raising slightly with his annoyance. “Just think of it as…as a…”

Laughter is threatening as you watch him struggle for a metaphor. Biting your lip, you enjoy the play of emotions on his face as his eyes widen slightly, then blink, and then his expression falls entirely as he finally realizes what he was saying. His hand quickly drops from yours.

“Like what, Buck?” you ask innocently. “Like a lover? Tell me how I should stab people. With just the tip?”

“Stop it,” Bucky snaps, though he’s clearly suppressing a smile.

“No, no; this is fun,” you purr. “And after all, you’re the expert, aren’t you?” His eyes are suddenly smoldering. Not with anger, you think. Uh oh - he must have realized that two can play this game. A smirk tilts his lips, and a sudden swoop of heat in your belly nearly keels you over. Focus, you think. Focus.

“Some have said that,” Bucky smirks a little grin that doesn’t help your focusing. You swallow past a dry throat. “But you are a terrible student,” he adds, and the hazy spell is broken.

“Well, if you’d said to hold it like a willy, I might’ve caught on sooner,” you say cheekily.  

“You shouldn’t hold a knife like a willy,” Bucky says with a shake of his head. “I guess my teaching skills are rusty.”

(A/N: The whole story isn’t this dirty, I promise. Not sure if that’s a good thing or a bad thing.)

Tagging some mutuals & buddies that might be interested / might be generous enough to signal boost 😉😏😘💕: @jamesbvck @moonbeambucky @beckzorz  @itsbuckysworld  @buckychrist @kat-lives @wintersoldierswhore @sgtjbuccky @wi-atch-recs @johnnysttorm

summary:
EPISODE 162: The THANKFUL 5 reasons for the life and legacy of STAN LEE 

This week fans all around the world learned the sad...
track_name: EPISODE 162: The THANKFUL 5 reasons for the life and legacy of STAN LEE
caption:
EPISODE 162: The THANKFUL 5 reasons for the life and legacy of STAN LEE

This week fans all around the world learned the sad news of the passing of the legendary writer and comic book icon Stan Lee. 

To honor and celebrate his contributions this episode will dedicate itself to acknowledging the 5 reasons to cherish what Stan has done for the world.

We also have some news in the world of ACMG including the controversial comments of Bill Maher and Armie Hammer in reference to Stan Lee’s passing.

This and much more on this special edition of TALK TIME LIVE.

blog.name: disney-avengersassemble
blog.title: Disney Avengers, ASSEMBLE!
blog.description:
The S.H.I.E.L.D. database has been recently notified about new superhumans in the world after an anomaly spike and...strangely enough they appear to be...Disney characters!

That's right, the lovable characters of Disney are being recruited to join the elite group known as the Avengers. Will your favorite help in saving the world or will they be one to help it fall? The choice is in your hands! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Come be your favorite characters from both the Marvel and Disney universes! Be sure to make sure that the character you want is open by checking the masterlist also remember to read the rules before joining as well! We hope to see an app from you soon! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ***sidebar image credit goes to TheLastDisneyToon on Deviantart.com***

caption:
Assembled we are strong.

                                                   Forever fight as one!

The S.H.I.E.L.D. database has been recently notified about new superhumans in the world after an anomaly spike and…strangely enough they appear to be…Disney characters! Disney Avengers is a freshly re-made RP group looking for it’s second life! Will you help to save the world or will you be one who seeks to watch it burn?

                                                                                     RULES // PLOT // CHARACTERS

trail.content:
Assembled we are strong.

                                                   Forever fight as one!

The S.H.I.E.L.D. database has been recently notified about new superhumans in the world after an anomaly spike and…strangely enough they appear to be…Disney characters! Disney Avengers is a freshly re-made RP group looking for it’s second life! Will you help to save the world or will you be one who seeks to watch it burn?

                                                                                     RULES // PLOT // CHARACTERS
